Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.abstract: The scheme to use when routing traffic to the host.

Structs/PusherClientOptions.html#/s:6Pus.abstract: Whether or not Transport Layer Security is used when

Structs/AuthToken.html.abstract: Encapsulates an authentication signature that can be used when users

Structs/Channel.html.name: Channel
Structs/Channel.html.abstract: A channel that can be queried for information, or be published to using an Event.

Structs/ChannelAttributeFetchOptions.htm.name: ChannelAttributeFetchOptions
Structs/ChannelAttributeFetchOptions.htm.abstract: Attributes of an occupied channel that can be fetched from the Pusher HTTP API.

Structs/ChannelAttributes.html.name: ChannelAttributes
Structs/ChannelAttributes.html.abstract: Channel attributes that can be fetched depending on the ChannelAttributeFetchOptions

Structs/ChannelInfo.html.name: ChannelInfo
Structs/ChannelInfo.html.abstract: An information record for an occupied channel.

Structs/ChannelSummary.html.name: ChannelSummary
Structs/ChannelSummary.html.abstract: A summarised information record for an occupied channel.

Structs/Event.html.name: Event
Structs/Event.html.abstract: An event to trigger on a specific channel (or multiple channels).

Structs/PresenceUserAuthData.html.name: PresenceUserAuthData
Structs/PresenceUserAuthData.html.abstract: User data required when generating an AuthToken for a subscription attempt to a presence channel.

Structs/User.html.name: User
Structs/User.html.abstract: An information record for a specific user currently subscribed to a presence channel.

Structs/Webhook.html.name: Webhook
Structs/Webhook.html.abstract: Contains events related to changes in the internal state of a Channels app,

Structs/WebhookEvent.html.name: WebhookEvent
Structs/WebhookEvent.html.abstract: An event that is contained within a received Webhook.

Structs/PusherClientOptions.html.name: PusherClientOptions
Structs/PusherClientOptions.html.abstract: A collection of configuration options for a Pusher Channels HTTP API client.

Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.name: channelOccupied
Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.abstract: A channel has become occupied. (i.e. there is at least one subscriber).

Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.name: channelVacated
Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.abstract: A channel has become vacated. (i.e. there are no subscribers).

Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.name: memberAdded
Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.abstract: A user has subscribed to a presence channel.

Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.name: memberRemoved
Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.abstract: A user has unsubscribed from a presence channel.

Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.name: clientEvent
Enums/WebhookEventType.html#/s:6Pusher16.abstract: A client event has been triggered on a private or presence channel.

Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.abstract: The response body could not be decoded to the specified type.

Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.abstract: The request body could not be encoded to the specified type.

Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.abstract: The server returned a failed response indicated by a non-successful HTTPStatusCode.

Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.abstract: An invalid configuration caused an error for some reason.

Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.name: unexpectedResponse

Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.name: errorDescription
Enums/PusherError.html#/s:6Pusher0A5Erro.abstract: A localized human-readable description of the error.

Enums/ChannelType.html#/s:6Pusher11Chann.abstract: Creates a ChannelType based on a channel name.

Enums/ChannelFilter.html#/s:6Pusher13Cha.abstract: A filter encapsulating any channel that can be subscribed to.

Enums/ChannelFilter.html.abstract: A filter that may be applied when fetching information on occupied channels from the HTTP API.

Enums/PusherError.html.abstract: An error whilst using the Pusher HTTP API Swift SDK.
